text: Edward John "Johnnie" Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer, MVO (24 January 1924 â€“ 29 March 1992), styled Viscount Althorp until June 1975, was a British peer. ==Early life== Spencer was born in Bayswater, London, He was son of Albert Spencer and Lady Cynthia Hamilton ==Personal life== He was married to Frances Roche, They have five children by the marriage, He was remarried to Raine, Countess of Dartmouth in 1976. He was the father of Diana, Princess of Wales. He was the maternal grandfather of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Prince Harry, Duke of Sussex. ==Death== Spencer died on 29 March 1992 at Wellington Hospital in London of a heart attack at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from London
title: John Spencer, 8th Earl Spencer
